.. py:class:: CollectionUserPermissions(view=False, annotate=False, add_documents=False, add_images=False, modify_users=False, modify_labels=False, modify_document_metadata=False, download_data=False, archive=False, delete_documents=False)

   Bases: :py:obj:`object`

   Collection permissions for a user as a dictionary of boolean flags.
       

   .. py:attribute:: view
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can view the collection and documents.
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: annotate
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can annotate collection documents.
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: add_documents
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can add documents to the collection.
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: add_images
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can add images to the collection.
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: modify_users
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can modify the list of viewers/annotators for the collection.
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: modify_labels
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can modify the list of labels for the collection.
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: modify_document_metadata
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can modify document metadata (such as changing the image).
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: download_data
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can download the collection data
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: archive
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can archive or unarchive the collection.
      :type: bool


   .. py:attribute:: delete_documents
      :annotation: :bool

      Whether the user can delete documents in the collection.
      :type: bool


   .. py:method:: to_dict(self) -> dict

      Returns a dict version of this object for conversion to JSON.

      :returns: a dict version of this object for conversion to JSON
      :rtype: dict
